name: Smoothie Moves
description:
The Webkinz World favorite comes to the iPhone and iPod Touch! Help Blanche fill her drink orders by clearing the path of fruits and ice cream coming her way! How many levels can you complete?
Earn Kinzcash™ while you play! Store and send KinzCash earnings to your active Webkinz World account whenever you have an internet connection. Now you can earn KinzCash while you're on a vacation, in the car, or just hanging out in the backyard.
Also check out these additional great Webkinz World games for your iPhone and iPod Touch: Polar Plunge, Goober’s Lab and Cash Cow 2!

For more information on Webkinz, visit webkinz.com.
